description: The FTSE 100 Daily Short Index aims to reflect the performance of the following market: 1x Short exposure to British blue chip companies listed in GBP on the London Stock Exchange Short exposure to the 100 largest and most liquid companies Weighted by free-float adjusted market capitalisation Quarterly index review Additional information on the index, selection and weighting methodology is available at https://www.ftse.com
name: Xtrackers FTSE 100 Short Daily Swap UCITS ETF 1C
